content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan Rahman, thank you for considering my apartment in New York. I understand that you are looking for a comfortable and affordable living space. Based on the 25 square meters of space available, I would like to suggest a rental price of €1,500 per month. This price is based on the current market rates in New York and takes into account the prime location of the apartment. I believe that this price is fair and reflects the value of the property. Is this rental price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €1,500 per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of €1,500 per month. I appreciate your interest in my apartment and I look forward to welcoming you as my tenant. Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have one question. What is included in the rental price?

I mean, is it just the rent or is it including utilities, maintenance, etc.?

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,

Hassan Rahman.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Hello Hassan Rahman,

Thank you for your question. The rental price of €1,500 per month includes the basic rent for the apartment, but it does not include utilities such as electricity, water, and gas. These utilities will be billed separately to you by the utility companies.

As for maintenance, I will be responsible for any major repairs and maintenance issues that may arise, but you will be responsible for any minor repairs and cleaning tasks. I will provide you with a detailed list of responsibilities in the lease agreement.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with. I'm looking forward to welcoming you as my tenant.

Best regards,

Heinrich Heine.
name: Heinrich Heine
